body.name: FORCE FACTOR Vitamin C 1000mg Immune Support Supplement, Vitamin C Supplement Immunity Vitamins Plus Antioxidant Support, Premium Quality, Vegan, 60 Vitamin C Tablets
features: BOOST IMMUNE FUNCTION: Force Factor Vitamin C is a robust immune support supplement. Each easy-to-swallow tablet delivers a potent dose of this crucial antioxidant, helping to fortify your immune system and promote overall wellness.

ENHANCE ANTIOXIDANT PROTECTION: Beyond its immune-boosting properties, Vitamin C is famous for its role as a powerful antioxidant. Every serving helps neutralize free radicals, protecting your cells from damage.

HIGH-POTENCY FORMULA: Ensure you're giving your body the support it needs with a high-potency Vitamin C formula. Force Factor Vitamin C 1000mg is designed for those who don't compromise on their health, offering robust support in every tablet.

PREMIUM QUALITY & VEGAN FRIENDLY: With no artificial colors, artificial flavors, or gelatin, you can rest assured that you’re choosing a high-quality, better-for-you vitamin c supplement for your daily wellness

MADE IN THE USA: Force Factor Vitamin C 1000mg is made in America in GMP-certified manufacturing facilities to ensure quality and safety. All of our ingredients go through rigorous testing to validate their potency and purity.
body.description: Elevate your daily health regimen with Force Factor Vitamin C 1000mg, a premium supplement meticulously crafted to enhance immune function and provide antioxidant protection. Each tablet delivers a high-potency dose of 1000mg of Vitamin C, a crucial antioxidant renowned for its ability to fortify the immune system and safeguard your overall wellness. The formula is designed to neutralize free radicals effectively, protecting your cells from potential damage and bolstering your body's natural defenses. Beyond its potent immune support, this supplement stands out with its commitment to quality and purity. It is vegan-friendly, free from artificial colors, flavors, and gelatin, ensuring that you are choosing a high-quality, better-for-you option for your daily wellness needs. Manufactured in the USA in GMP-certified facilities, Force Factor Vitamin C undergoes rigorous testing to validate its potency and purity, providing you with a reliable and powerful supplement to support your health journey. Choose Force Factor Vitamin C for robust immune support and antioxidant protection you can trust.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: STACK YOUR HEALTH ROUTINE Protect Your Health Made for Daily Health Protect Your Immunity Strengthen Immunity High-potency dose to support immune function and daily wellness. Helps Fight Off Colds Traditionally used to boost immunity, making it easier to fight colds. High-Potency Immune Support High-potency formula promotes a strong and healthy immune system. Support Bone Health Helps your body absorb and utilize calcium to support strong bones. Boost Antioxidants Elderberry capsules provide cellular protection against oxidative stress. Contains 3 Forms of Zinc Contains zinc oxide, zinc gluconate, and zinc citrate for a balanced formula. High-Potency Formula High-potency 5000 IU dose to support immune function and daily wellness. Premium Quality Vegan friendly with no artificial colors, artificial flavors, or gelatin. Lab-Tested & Made in the USA Made in America in GMP-certified facilities to ensure quality and safety.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These vitamins are enormous! I break them into to swallow them. They do have a coating on them that is supposed to make them easier to swallow but still, they are too big. I wish they had the dividing line in the middle to make them easier to break. They seem to be a good quality. I particularly like that they are 1000mg.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Take
reviews.reviewText: This does not leave and after taste nor does it have a bitted flavor. I’m impressed with the quality as I’ve noticed a difference since adding this to my supplement regime.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars FORCE FACTOR Vitamin C 1000mg Immune Support Supplement, Vitamin C Supplement
reviews.reviewText: The tablets are roughly the same size as other brands I've bought. They're big, but I don't have any issues swallowing. These work for my needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars a bit challenging for me to swallow
reviews.reviewText: The FORCE FACTOR Vitamin C 1000mg supplement is undoubtedly a powerhouse in the realm of immune support. With 60 vitamin C tablets per bottle, it offers a substantial dose to boost immunity and provide antioxidant support.The premium quality and vegan nature of these tablets align with my preference for quality supplements. However, it's worth noting that the size of the tablets is larger than I anticipated, making them a bit challenging for me to swallow comfortably.Despite the size concern, the effectiveness of this vitamin C supplement makes it a valuable addition to my daily routine. If you don't mind larger tablets and are seeking a robust immune support solution, FORCE FACTOR Vitamin C 1000mg is definitely worth considering for its quality and potency.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Vitamin C support
reviews.reviewText: I've always been a fan of Force Factor's vitamins and supplements When I had to reup on my vitamin C for flu season, I knew these would do the trick. And so far so good!! Great to boost immunity before the holidays. A little on the large size in terms of swallowing, but effective nonetheless

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Good Value
reviews.reviewText: Short of labratory analysis, it is difficult to quantify effectiveness of this sort of product. But utilization was certainly easy and without unpleasant flavor. In the mind of a trusting user, it seems to have the properties promised...and at much lower cost than many alternative products. ~ The Duffian

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I expected
reviews.reviewText: These vitamin c pills are exactly what I expected and are taken to supplement so I can't really comment on efficacy. However they are easy to swallow and don't upset my stomach.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The dosage yields decent value for those of us who have been advised to up their vitamin c intake. I'll likely reorder this product, but the tablets aren't the easiest to down. They're heftier than I'd prefer and may be tough for some to swallow. Capsules are a better match for my needs.
